name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Puppets
description:
This game is not mine. is an old internet game that I posted here to make it easier for other people to find!

I'm not sure if this game works on Mac or Linux if don't please tell me in the comments
This is a physics stickman fighting game, It was made for a event of games in europe. The game is simple, use the W A S D keys to move around your blue stickman and try to hit the enemy (orange stickmans, ninjas, etc) meanwhile not getting hit

hint: attacks on head do more damage
